item.description:
Moving into our fourth rehearsal, we’ll aim to advance our self-awareness as performers. We’ll focus on character development, since strong, varied characters contribute to the believability of a scene. Our challenge: creating these characters in the spontaneous, audience-driven scenes that we perform. After some drillwork, we’ll introduce a few new structured games. Practicing these games will give us a further taste of future performances. This will be a productive and fun rehearsal, as much as a challenging one. Get your rest, drink your coffee, and bring your actor’s impulse. As a heads up, I'll be taking a few photos during this rehearsal.

See you soon!
Harish

Note: We are officially on for 5:00-7:00 pm.

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Meeting 4: Character, Character, Character
